Warning:
July 28, 2017,  The Loop issued the following Alert on its Facebook page:

Blue anonymous pills at Kendal Calling

There are blue anonymous pills containing 100+mg pentylone (but no MDMA) seized on site (standard dose 20-40mg): 4 hour duration, causing problems on site. Several users in paramedics, contain suspected high dose, longlasting stimulant, see medics if at all ill.
